about_the_game:
Your journey into The Untold Legends begins.

While investigating an anomaly in the woods, you are separated from your team and captured by Baba Yaga. With no signal to contact your friends, you must explore this dark and atmospheric world alone. Using your compass as a guide, navigate your way through the open world in search of information about what happened and to gather clues to help you find a way to escape.

Face your fears a solve the mysteries.

Ascend to frightening heights as you traverse the mountain peaks and dig up secrets as you explore the abandoned mining tunnels. Discover audio recordings left behind, search for keys to unlock new areas and solve the mystery of the secret pages. Keep your guard up as you never know around which corner Baba may be lurking.

Using the environment around you.

Collect branches and create a torch which can ignite unlit firepits and be attached to the environment to mark your path, or kept close by to ward of Baba. Take shelter in a near by tent or porta potty, but make sure she doesn't see you enter.

Write your own story.

Stay on the path and follow the clues or make your trail using torches to light firepits and attach to the environment to mark your way. But take caution as the actions you take and the information you gather will determine the ending of your story.

Your journey into The Untold Legends begins.

While investigating an anomaly in the woods, you are separated from your team and captured by Baba Yaga. With no signal to contact your friends, you must explore this dark and atmospheric world alone. Discover audio recordings left behind, search for keys to unlock new areas and solve the mystery of the secret pages. Keep your guard up as you never know around which corner Baba may be lurking.

Collect branches and create a torch which can ignite unlit firepits and be attached to the environment to mark your path, or kept close by to ward of Baba. Take shelter in a near by tent or porta potty, but make sure she doesn't see you enter.

Stay on the path and follow the clues or make your trail using torches to light firepits and attach to the environment to mark your way. But take caution as the actions you take and the information you gather will determine the ending of your story.
name: The Untold Legends: Baba Yaga

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4430, AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 (4 GB), AMD R9 290X (4 GB)
  • Storage: 126 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6 GB), AMD RX 570 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 126 GB available space

short_description: The first in a series of exploration/horror games giving a new twist on old legends. Follow the clues and stay on the trail or navigate the open world and choose your own path, but beware, the actions you take may alter your ending. Unveil the story while evading the clutches of Baba Yaga.
